articles.title: WBA welterweight title won’t be at stake when Pacquiao fights Spence - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: Pacquiao will be coming into the Spence fight on August 21 a full challenger, as the American holds the WBC and the IBF versions of the crown.
articles.content:
Pacquiao remains 'champion in recess'
The WBA "super" welterweight crown won't be included among the titles at stake in the August 21 fight between Manny Pacquiao and Errol Spence Jr.

articles.title: National Spelling Bee winner is also a basketball prodigy - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Zaila Avant-garde made history Thursday as the first African American student to win the Scripps National Spelling Bee. The word she spelled correctly to win was "Murraya," which is a genus of tropical Asiatic and Australian trees. Her victory during the fina…

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Move over Messi, Argentina has a new hero - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: Emiliano Martinez needed only a month to establish himself as Argentina's number one goalkeeper and this week he became a new national hero by saving three times in a shootout in their Copa America semi-final against Colombia.
